name: Hands Of Time
description:
Our submission for Wowie Game Jam 2.0!

We went with something a bit original: Time itself has glitched. But if you're a time doctor who knows his job well, you'll surely fix time in no time. 

How to play:

Drag the cards on the player, enemies and projectiles.
You cannot move and need to use the cards to do so.

Press space to slow down time and release it to completely stop time.
Press again to resume time.

Press the "rewind" button on the top-right corner to restart the level when stuck.

Also, here's a little hint: You can use cards on projectiles.

But why is there no WebGL release?

The game was intended to run with Wwise, which doesn't support WebGL as far as I know.
